ہوائی جہاز کی گلائیڈ ریشو کیا ہے؟ گلائیڈ ریشو فاصلے کو کیسے ظاہر کرتی ہے؟
ہوائی جہاز گلائیڈنگ نزول کے دوران اپنی ا: Can airplanes glide during descent? Do airplanes lose altitude while gliding?

Even not- so- modern airliners can glide fairly well, and the newer, the better. Yes, the airlines throttle back the engines on descent, perhaps not to idle, but significantly, with fuel savings as the primary objective. They seldom go into a full glide, prefering a more gentle slope than an unpowered glide would be.
Can airplanes glide during descent? Do airplanes lose altitude while gliding?

How Far Can a Jetliner Glide? So essentially, any plane can glide if the need arises. And in situations where all the engines have failed, pilots have to expect the plane to do some gliding. Without the thrust those engines are built to provide, the plane can't help but lose altitude.
